issue.title: Walking controller stability decreases as real time factor decreases

content.raw:
Thank you for the response.  I had assumed (apparently incorrectly) that OSRF was being supported by the developers of the controller.

I don't know the controller code enough to attempt any changes.  My attempts at adjusting the damping of the hip yaw joint did increase stability at low real time factors, but did not fully resolve the oscillation.
content.html:
Thank you for the response. I had assumed (apparently incorrectly) that OSRF was being supported by the developers of the controller.

I don't know the controller code enough to attempt any changes. My attempts at adjusting the damping of the hip yaw joint did increase stability at low real time factors, but did not fully resolve the oscillation.
